title: My Savior, My Stalker: An Innocent Obsession
description: Her letters are the only thing keeping him sane in this hell hole. Years of fantasizing have turned into a dark, all-consuming obsession. He's about to be released from prison, and he'll never leave her alone again.I am totally innocent when it comes to men.My alcoholic father controls every aspect of my life, and I can't stand his abuse any longer.I need to escape, but how?I write to my stepbrother every week, my only friend in this lonely world.It's been years since I've seen him, but his letters give me hope of a brighter future.He's coming for me, and he's the only one that can save me. But who will save me from him?
author: R.R. Rider
